The other miscellaneous entertainers and small iron insects.
Seeing them all clapping their hands.
The sound of their cries was like smoke and fire.
They were burned at the same time.
Burned to death, they revived.
They suffered from each other without a moment's rest.

He sent them to make music, and the suffering did not cease.
When Pule arrived at the prison, he saw these suffering children like this for five days.
On the sixth day, the king called Pule and said:
You are not supposed to die yet.
Examine the case again.
After three years, your life will be exhausted.
The suffering you will experience in the future will be like this.
This person, in his lifetime, spoke falsely, harshly, and frivolously.
He teased monks and nuns.
He ridiculed the Buddha's teachings.
He pretended to rely on the Three Jewels.
He deceived others to obtain their belongings.
He exclusively used them to support his wife and children.
He liked to kill pigs and sheep.
He ate meat and drank alcohol.
Sometimes he went to the monastery and used the monks' belongings, defiling them with impurity.
Due to not observing the precepts, they receive such misfortune.
Although you do not have such grave offenses,
you are not without other faults.

When you die, I will take you.
He sent the two men back to his home.
He saw a bed-sized area.
The branches and leaves of the thorn forest were dense.
The two men told him to enter this forest.
This man initially did not want to enter.
The two men pushed him hard.
He entered with his eyes closed.
He immediately felt his body on the bed, having come back to life.
Pu Le Yin saw this omen.
He then went to the capital and received the precepts in various temples.
He upheld them strictly and did not violate them.
He ate vegetarian food and observed the precepts for a long time.
